overview: Angel Rivera is a beautifully handsome lover, versatile, and brimming with candor. But there's so much more to him than just these qualities. He's also very driven, an independent entrepreneur making his way to porn stardom. While he might appear to be laid back, he's a passionate sexual dynamo. Here the Sweet Angel is paired with Avery Jones, and is joined by more big-dicked studs to show that sweet angels can also be little devils.
title: Sweet Angel
